meta.name: Z-Index System
meta.description: Named z-index layers for consistent stacking — base, dropdown, sticky, overlay, modal, popover, toast, and tooltip. Prevents z-index conflicts with clear semantic layers.

layer.$description: Named z-index layers from lowest to highest

popover.$description: Popovers, date pickers on top of modals

tooltip.$description: Tooltips — always on top of content

max.$description: Escape hatch for critical system UI
